text: Old Dabolim Railway Station Dabolim is a village in Mormugão, Goa. It is located about 30 km from the state capital Panjim, 23 km from the South Goa district headquarters Margão and 5 km from Vasco da Gama, the headquarters of Mormugão. Dabolim Airport, the only airport in Goa, is located here. Category:Villages in South Goa district
title: Dabolim
